name: Shooting Space (Old Prototype)
description:
Annihilate alien enemies with the Energy Laser as you blast through in Shooting Space!

This is an old prototype game made in Game Maker. 

Only Endless Mode is accessable, but enjoy taking out the enemy ships!

Game starts in full-screen mode.

{ Music by EliteFerrex }

Game Controls:

Menu: 

[Up]/[Down] : Select , [Enter]: Confirm

Gameplay: 

 Mouse move: Move ship, Left Click: Shoot, Hold Right MB: Energy Laser

[Esc] Exit game
